article.description: David Robertson scored 23 points, including two key 3-pointers in overtime to lift UNC Asheville over Gardner-Webb 90-85 on Saturday.
article.headline: Robertson's  OT 3s help UNC Asheville top Gardner-Webb 90-85
article.linkText: Robertson's  OT 3s help UNC Asheville top Gardner-Webb 90-85
article.story: ASHEVILLE, N.C. -- David Robertson scored 23 points, including two key 3-pointers in overtime to lift UNC Asheville over Gardner-Webb 90-85 on Saturday. Robertson made consecutive 3s to give UNC Asheville an 86-81 lead with 53 seconds remaining. Gardner-Webb pulled to 88-85 with 10 seconds left, and had a chance to get closer but Liam O'Reilly missed a free throw, and UNC Asheville's Kevin Vannatta grabbed the rebound. Ahmad Thomas sealed it with a dunk. MaCio Teague scored 25 points for UNC Asheville (9-6, 1-1 Big South Conference), which bounced back from losing three straight, all by three points or less. Thomas added 16 points and nine assists. Vannatta had 11 points and six assists. Jamaal Robateau and Laquincy Rideau scored 16 points apiece for Gardner-Webb (7-8, 0-2). David Efianayi added 15 points. Robateau made a 3-pointer with two seconds left in regulation to make it 75-75 and force overtime.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
